channel.title: Client Run Error
channel.description: I changed something in signlink.java, compiled, ran the client. It showed a black screen with "Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading ....Scape" I checked the prompt and this is what it showed. What should I do? [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\PK (Access is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:132) at Update.<init>(Update.java:33) at client.method67(client.java:4409) at client.method6(client.java:8325) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:49) at client.run(client.java:5580) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) error java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.method56(client.java:3601) at client.method6(client.java:8330) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:49) at client.run(client.java:5580) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Client Run Error
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

Run as administator, Seems like you not allowed to create a folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Run Error
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I changed something in signlink.java, compiled, ran the client. It showed a black screen with “Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading …Scape” I checked the prompt and this is what it showed. What should I do?

java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\PK (Access is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:132) at Update.<init>(Update.java:33) at client.method67(client.java:4409) at client.method6(client.java:8325) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:49) at client.run(client.java:5580) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) error java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.method56(client.java:3601) at client.method6(client.java:8330) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:49) at client.run(client.java:5580) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
